thread.title: Fall in Paris
thread.title_full: Fall in Paris - Review of The Westin Paris - Vendome, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Samiran_Ghosh
title: Fall in Paris
text: Excellent staff and service, family vacation at Paris stayed at Westin V. Centrally located property minutes from Louvre. Little dated property, but makes up for the convenience and service. As we were traveling with toddler the staff upgraded us to their larger suite and ensure that minute details of traveling with a baby is taken care.
